content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'raw_sadevbrdatalakemalwee_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [raw_sadevbrdatalakemalwee_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION   = 'https://sadevbrdatalakemalwee.dfs.core.windows.net/raw', 
	)
Go

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE raw_data.sap_j_3apghd (
	[MANDT] varchar(8000),
	[J_3APGNR] varchar(8000),
	[J_3AVDAT] varchar(8000),
	[J_3AKTXT] varchar(8000),
	[J_3ADLKZ] varchar(8000),
	[J_3AUSED] varchar(8000),
	[J_3ACRDT] varchar(8000),
	[J_3AEDDT] varchar(8000),
	[J_3AUSER] varchar(8000),
	[J_3ABZD1] varchar(8000),
	[J_3ABZD2] varchar(8000),
	[J_3ABZD3] varchar(8000),
	[J_3ABZDX] varchar(8000),
	[J_3ASGTP] varchar(8000),
	[J_3ABYT1] varchar(8000),
	[J_3ABYT2] varchar(8000),
	[J_3ABYT3] varchar(8000),
	[J_3ARGTP] varchar(8000),
	[J_3ARGNR] varchar(8000),
	[J_3ARDAT] varchar(8000),
	[J_3AMGNR] varchar(8000),
	[J_3AMDAT] varchar(8000),
	[J_3ADOCALL] varchar(8000),
	[J_3ARECNOT] varchar(8000),
	[J_3ARECNO] varchar(8000),
	[VTNAM] varchar(8000),
	[J_3ASODI1] varchar(8000),
	[J_3ASODI2] varchar(8000),
	[J_3ASODI3] varchar(8000),
	[J_3AGFILL] varchar(8000),
	[J_3AGCONV] varchar(8000),
	[J_3AGCONV2] varchar(8000),
	[J_3AGCONV3] varchar(8000),
	[J_3AGSORT] varchar(8000),
	[J_3ABXDX] varchar(8000),
	[J_3ABYDX] varchar(8000),
	[/AFS/GRIDBLKZ] varchar(8000),
	[/AFS/GRIDBLKZ2] varchar(8000),
	[/AFS/GRIDBLKZ3] varchar(8000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'brazil/saptable/j_3apghd/*/*/*/*.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [raw_sadevbrdatalakemalwee_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM raw_data.sap_j_3apghd
GO
